channel.title: LibreBeacon - open implementation of iBeacon and BLE resource site
channel.description: LibreBeacon is a site for creating and documenting an open reference design for Apple's iBeacon technology.

item.title: Welcome to LibreBeacon!
item.description:
Welcome to the LibreBeacon.org! This sites aims are to develop a completely open design of iBeacon hardware and provide developers, hackers and retailers with as much open-source and open-hardware information and resources as possible.

iBeacon is a trademark of Apple Inc.
